photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

SavedRole.title: Saved Role
SavedRole.description: A career role that a user has saved for future reference.

name.description: The name of the career role.

responsibilities.description: The key responsibilities of the role.

skills.description: A list of required skills for the role.

tools.description: A list of typical tools used in the role.

parentSubfield.description: The name of the subfield this role belongs to.

savedAt.description: The timestamp when the role was saved.

BlogPost.title: Blog Post
BlogPost.description: Represents a single blog post article.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the title.

content.description: The main content of the blog post in Markdown format.

isPublished.description: Whether the post is visible to the public.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who wrote the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/savedRoles/{roleId}.description: A subcollection storing the career roles saved by a user.

/blogPosts/{postId}.description: A collection storing all blog post articles.
